name: Doge Warrior
description:
Instruction:

Arrow keys for movement, Z to fire, X to pull/push switches. P to restart.

Story:

A WereDoge has been imprisoned by Evil Cat Warlord deep in a dungeon beneath the castle.

Your objective is to solve puzzles, explore the labyrinth for escape route and kill the cats if needed. There is a boss fight at the end of the level. You can upgrade your firepower by eating the upgrades along the way.


Objectives:

  • Explore a labyrinth to escape
  • Upgradable Fire Power
  • Boss fight at the end of the game.
